title: Embedding Files in Go Binaries
description: This lab aims to test your understanding of the embed package in Golang. The embed package allows programs to include arbitrary files and folders in the Go binary at build time.

meta.title: Embedding Files in Go Binaries
meta.description: Learn how to embed files and folders into Go binaries using the embed package.
meta.keywords: file, go, golang, go labs, binary, go playground online, go lab, embed, go practice

verify.name: Verify Embedding Go Code and Checking Output
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
